body_html: Indeed - any sub-scope of a reusing scope is also reusing. So just setting things with .reuse_variables() can be a bit dangerous. We could forbid it and have only context, but on the other hand it's convenient from time to time.
body_text: Indeed - any sub-scope of a reusing scope is also reusing. So just setting things with .reuse_variables() can be a bit dangerous. We could forbid it and have only context, but on the other hand it's convenient from time to time.
body: Indeed - any sub-scope of a reusing scope is also reusing. So just setting things with .reuse_variables() can be a bit dangerous. We could forbid it and have only context, but on the other hand it's convenient from time to time.
